```{=html}
<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  // ç»Ÿè®¡é¡¹ç›®æ•°é‡
  const listingItems = document.querySelectorAll('#projects-listing .quarto-listing-default .list-item, #projects-listing .quarto-post, #projects-listing .g-col-1');
  const projectCount = listingItems.length;
  
  const projectCountEl = document.getElementById('project-count');
  if (projectCountEl) {
    projectCountEl.textContent = projectCount > 0 ? projectCount : '0';
  }
  
  // ç»Ÿè®¡åˆ†ç±»æ•°é‡
  const categories = new Set();
  document.querySelectorAll('#projects-listing .listing-category, #projects-listing .quarto-category').forEach(cat => {
    categories.add(cat.textContent.trim());
  });
  const categoryCountEl = document.getElementById('project-category-count');
  if (categoryCountEl) {
    categoryCountEl.textContent = categories.size > 0 ? categories.size : '0';
  }
  
  // è·å–æœ€è¿‘æ›´æ–°æ—¥æœŸ
  const dates = document.querySelectorAll('#projects-listing .listing-date');
  if (dates.length > 0) {
    const latestDateEl = document.getElementById('project-latest-date');
    if (latestDateEl) {
      latestDateEl.textContent = dates[0].textContent.trim().slice(0, 7) || '-';
    }
  }
});
</script>
```
